thread.title: UCLA punter Adam Searl is arrested on suspicion of sexual assualt
thread.title_full: UCLA punter Adam Searl is arrested on suspicion of sexual assualt

author: Chris Foster
title: UCLA punter Adam Searl is arrested on suspicion of sexual assualt
text:
UCLA punter Adam Searl is arrested on suspicion of sexual assualt Adam Searl 
Adam Searl is seen in a photo from the UCLA Bruins website. 
Adam Searl is seen in a photo from the UCLA Bruins website. (UCLA) Chris Foster Contact Reporter 
Adam Searl, a punter for UCLA, was arrested Thursday on suspicion of sexual assault. 
Searl, a walk-on, was released on $300,000 bond Thursday night. He is scheduled to appear in court Oct. 29. 
In a statement, UCLA Coach Jim Mora said, "We have been informed of the situation involving Adam Searl, and we take these accusations very seriously. Adam has been suspended from the team indefinitely while the legal process runs its course. Due to the ongoing police investigation, we are unable to discuss this matter further at this time." 
Searl, a junior, has been the teamâ€™s backup punter. He played in his first game of the season against Arizona State on Saturday and averaged 39.0 yards per punt.
